CalculationProcedureStep.name: CalculationProcedureStep
CalculationProcedureStep.description: Defines a step in an Expression Set. The label for this object is Expression Set Step.

CalculationMatrixId.description: The ID of the Decision Matrix this step calls. Applicable only if the StepType is MatrixLookupor GroupMatrixLookup.

CalculationMatrixType.description: The type of the Decision Matrix this step calls. Applicable only if this step calls a Decision Matrix. If the StepType is MatrixLookup, the value of this field is Standard. If the StepType is GroupMatrixLookup, the value of this field is Grouped.

CalculationProcedure.description: The ID of the Expression Set to which this step belongs.

CalculationProcedureVersionId.description: The ID of the Expression Set Version to which this step belongs.

ConditionsConvertedText.description: The condition expression converted to postfix notation. Applicable only if the StepType is Condition.

ConditionsExpressionText.description: The condition expression as the user entered it. Applicable only if the StepType is Condition.

ConditionsUiFormattedText.description: The condition expression converted to JSON format for UI display. Applicable only if the StepType is Condition.

Description.description: A text description of the Expression Set Step.

FormulaConvertedText.description: The formula expression converted to postfix notation. Applicable only if the StepType is Calculation.

FormulaExpressionText.description: The formula expression as the user entered it. Applicable only if the StepType is Calculation.

FormulaUiFormattedText.description: The formula expression converted to JSON format for UI display. Applicable only if the StepType is Calculation.

InputVariablesFormatText.description: A list of the input matrix columns or procedure variables applicable to the step.

IsConditionalStep.description: Specifies that this step is conditional.

IsResultIncluded.description: Specifies that the result of this step is included in the Expression Set output.

OutputVariablesFormatText.description: A list of the output matrix columns or procedure variables applicable to the step. Applicable only if the StepType is MatrixLookup, GroupMatrixLookup, or ReferenceProcedure.

OutputVariablesMappingText.description: Maps Decision Matrix output variables to Expression Set variables. Applicable only if the StepType is MatrixLookupor GroupMatrixLookup.

ReferenceProcedureId.description: The ID of the child Expression Set this step calls. Applicable only if the StepType is ReferenceProcedure.

ReturnMessageValueSet.description: A set of messages to return based on the result of a step with a StepType of Condition.

Stage.description: The stage of Expression Set invocation. The Aggregation stage applies only to steps with a StepType of Aggregation.

StageStepSequence.description: Sequence order of the step within the Expression Set. Used only for Expression Sets migrated from a Salesforce Industries package. New Expression Sets use Expression Set Step Relationship objects to order their steps.

StepType.description: The type of action this step performs.
